title: Every game is winnable!
body: In this game we had a trolling bard who went 0/20 and we were certain that we were going to lose. but through the enemy team not being very good themselves and us trying as hard as we could we still managed to snag a win! Never give up. (well, almost never)

replies.body:
Yep. I had a game where the enemy team absolutely destroyed us, and when it got to the point where our nexus was exposed, they didn't bother attacking it. They could have ended the game right there. Instead, they kept taunting us right outside our base, and when our thresh came up he managed to kill their adc and jungler by hook + flay. We all came up and proceeded to ace them, then pushed for the win. The enemy team was so pissed xD.

This was in normals, so its not as great as it sounds :P

Great job!
Every win's a win, doesn't matter if it's ranked or bots.
I did the same thing. I left their nexus on 19 hp. We lost the game haha

Congrats on beating the Trolls, but they'll never learn from it.   
But sometimes, when your team stands no chance, it is hard to just sit there and waste the next 15-20 mins and hope to pull of your type of victory.   (With me on the team, I am amazed if we win....lol as I am a hindrance not a help....lol)
So just moving on steals their glory killing, which is no harm.   They know they won well, no need to boost their stats or ego's.
Congrats on the lucky run.

Congrats you got a shot of a intentional feeder troll, now just hope @Riot looks at this and goes.
"Lets teach this guy a lesson"

Well, here is hoping anyway.
No Luden's on Diana? Wat mate
